title: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Online and Blended Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: For corporate mathematics education managers, developing online/blended instruction design competencies to adapt to post-pandemic learning environments.

learning_goals: Participants develop at least two online-optimized mathematics instructional design frameworks through team-based collaboration
Participants create concrete implementation plans for transitioning traditional face-to-face classes to blended learning models based on reflective practice
Participants produce interactive digital content (quizzes, simulations, etc.) that enhances mathematical concept comprehension by applying experiential learning theory
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
